Definition: Given a sentence in English, provide the sentiment based on its empathetic direction. There are two possible classifications happy or offmychest (i.e. positive vs. negative).

Positive Examples.input: was down for a long time , wanted to show off what changed all that , my mermaid hair .
Positive Examples.explanation: In this context, this would be classified as positive sentiment since the speaker disjuncts "was down for a long time" with their new changed hair insinuating a positive sentiment; therefore, it is correctly classified.

Positive Examples.input: i hate working . i know most people feel the same way . i just absolutely hate working 40 hours a week . i feel like i ’m wasting my life away at work . i hate it . i ’d rather do so many other things . after i graduated undergrad , i went back to school after a year because i hated working full time . after graduating with my masters , i still hate working .
Positive Examples.explanation: In this context, this would be classified as negative sentiment since the speaker uses strong negative connotative words such as "hate", "wasting", "rather", etc; so, it is classified correctly

Negative Examples.input: i have spent more than half my life biting my nails as an anxiety coping mechanism . today it 's exactly 3 months since i 'd stopped . it makes me so happy and proud and i have no one else to share it with .
Negative Examples.explanation: In this context, it is not correctly classified as the speaker mentions extreme feelings of happiness after stopping a negative habit and use of the word "proud"

Negative Examples.input: i hate . i hate that i feel in love with the person i consider my best friend . i hate the fact that i know the only way i can stop having stop these feelings is to completely remove her from my life . i hate the fact that its going that its going to hurt us . i hate that i 've to come to this decision
Negative Examples.explanation: In this context, the example is incorrectly classified as positive even though the speaker uses strong negatively-connotated words such as "hate", "stop", "remove", and "hurt".

Instances.input: my girlfriend and i like to occasionally skip town together to escape our stresses . so yesterday we spent 12 hours shopping and eating and could n't have been happier.﻿ :)
was down for a long time , wanted to show off what changed all that , my mermaid hair .
it 's my dad 's birthday ! he forgot it was his birthday until we brought him some ice cream ! i 'm so happy to see this guy reach another year .
finally achieved one of my life goals and started taking fencing classes ! i 'm very excited and happy about this you see .

i have spent more than half my life biting my nails as an anxiety coping mechanism . today it 's exactly 3 months since i 'd stopped . it makes me so happy and proud and i have no one else to share it with .
she ’s the one .

2018 was the absolute worst year of my life . but look at me ! my heart ’s still tickin ’ ! i got the rest of my life ahead of me to figure this out . i still got my friends and they ’re the best part ! i have disposable money on me ! i ’m not the ugliest thing on earth ! 2019 is gon na be great ! happy new year everyone !

could n’t work or face any social situations for months because of depression and self confidence issues . decided to switch careers and chase a passion of cooking i ’ve always had . met a girl . happy again . it definitely gets better people chin up !
pretty happy to see my art improvement over the past year !

my grandmother , me , mom 3 , mom 2 , and momma ! probably one of my favorite pics ever . these are my favorite ladies on the planet . moved around a lot growing up and all these lovely ladies were at my sister 's wedding this weekend . happy days !

i 'm gon na be a dad . i found out yesterday that we 're about 6 - 7 weeks along with our first child . i ca n't help being overwhelmed with joy whenever i think about it ! too early to tell friends and family so i needed somewhere to proclaim how pumped i am to be a future dad ! thank you everyone :)

yesterday was my birthday - my boyfriend took me on a surprise trip to harry potter studios , and i was offered an unconditional place at cardiff university for my english literature ma . best birthday ever .

eating dinner i prepared for myself , drinking a glass of cheap red wine with cookie dough ice cream in the freezer . and yeah , i 'm a 24 year old dude , but i just landed in san francisco to start my dream job . i left all my friends in new york , but it 's my first night here , i 'm all by myself on this new adventure and i could not be happier .
i turn 18 in 4 days , i 'm about to kill myself , yet i 'm happy .
after 10 years of trying , i 've been cigarette free for a month .
our daughter was born this weekend and we finally got to have our first family dinner .
four months ago , i finally started standing up for myself and set some boundaries . i have n't stopped smiling this doofy grin since :)

i finally asked out my friend after 2 years ! he said yes ! i ’m so happy . i ’ve been giggling and giddy for the last few hours . a different friend told me to take the chance and i did ! and holy fuck he said yes ! we ’ve been sleeping together on and off for awhile casually and i ’ve dated other people in the interim but i keep coming back to him . and fucking hell he said yes !
whenever i 'm feeling down , this little one cheers me up and brings me so much happiness !
this is my son ! last night i was sitting on the couch with him in one arm and my wife the other . i do n't think i 've ever felt so happy or blessed in my life .
i m an indie filmmaker - won my first ever award last night for our upcoming short . took home ' best cinematography ' , beyond excited .
he proposed ! best birthday gift ever !
if it was n't for seinfeld ....

i hate working . i know most people feel the same way . i just absolutely hate working 40 hours a week . i feel like i ’m wasting my life away at work . i hate it . i ’d rather do so many other things . after i graduated undergrad , i went back to school after a year because i hated working full time . after graduating with my masters , i still hate working .
i loved her . things just could n't be simpler . i 'll live , but sometimes , life just fucking bites .

whenever there 's a murder case in my city , i feel relief when the suspect is n't black . as a 26yo black male , i constantly need to fight back against racism , social disapproval and stereotypes . for every success i have there will be a murder case in the news that always involves another young black male . this just reinforces society 's negative impression of black people . whenever the suspect is white or asian i feel good .
i 'm glad you broke up with me .

talking to people is still a struggle . i think i 've always had quite bad anxiety throughout my life especially in social situations . when i was a kid i could barely speak to people i was n't familiar with . hell sometimes even to people i was familiar with . now i think i 've gotten better at it but i still struggle with it , i developed a bit of an ego which helps me get past that but the difficulty is still there .

i just want a long hug . but not that kind of hug . i want to have a long hug , from someone suitable to be my so , that we both like each other , and that there is nothing wrong about us having deep feelings for each other . a hug that we do n't want to stop .

18 years you 've been gone . 18 years ago today you went into diabetic shock in the middle of the night . your heart could n't take it and it stopped . you died in the sleep . it was a shock to us . you were 49 years old . mom lost a husband and i lost a dad . after all these years , it still hurts . yes , it hurts less as the time goes on .
